data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Paraguarí, Paraguay from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Paraguarí, Paraguay
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Paraguarí, Paraguay to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, help the 18,261 believers find a person of peace today among the 209,639 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 18,261 believers in the state of Paraguarí to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Paraguarí.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Paraguarí to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 18,261 believers in Paraguarí, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Paraguarí, Paraguay has a population of 227,900.

We estimate Paraguarí has 18,261 people who might know Jesus, 199,600 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 10,039 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.
